sentences.sContent: Insults only served to inflame the feud.
sentences.sContent_eng: Insults only served to inflame the feud.
sentences.sCn: 侮辱只是起到了加剧长期不和的作用。

sentences.sContent: The proclamation may be part of a larger feud within the government, and perhaps in the business world as well, over parceling out regulation of the booming industry.
sentences.sContent_eng: The proclamation may be part of a larger feud within the government, and perhaps in the business world as well, over parceling out regulation of the booming industry.
sentences.sCn: 在这个正在急速壮大的产业中制定规则的宣言可能成为政府内部更大的争执的一部分，商业世界可能也是如此。

sentences.sContent: They discover that they have some differences, but also that they share many things — including an utter lack of interest in keeping up the feud.
sentences.sContent_eng: They discover that they have some differences, but also that they share many things — including an utter lack of interest in keeping up the feud.
sentences.sCn: 他们发现有了许多不同的地方，同时也有许多相同之处——包括完全没有兴趣继续保持不和。

words.tran: 封建制度的；领地的；世仇的
使……形成封建制度；使……封建化

trans.tranOther: an angry and often violent quarrel between two people or groups that continues for a long time
to continue quarrelling for a long time, often in a violent way
